attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the the PM and Government of the UK not to use England's tax monies elsewhere within the British Isles or World unless it's in the interests of the English people's  due to the UK government's practice of discrimination, predudice and racism  to people of England. Who are not afforded an equal government or democratic representation, as the other countries within the (now Broken union) No Taxation without England's representation. until we have a full Parliament of our own. -

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
